segments.advisor_message: Alright! So, to start things off, what specific goals or objectives do you want to tackle today? I know you mentioned some ideas earlier, just want to get a clearer picture.
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah! So, I really want to, like, focus on saving for a house and maybe put some cash away for, um, vacations or something? Also, I kinda wanna look at retirement stuff too, just to see where I stand. Hope that makes sense!
